rooms.name: Living Room / Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan space that combines the living and dining area with a view towards the swimming pool. Uses energy-efficient LED lighting and large windows to maximize natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open plan design integrated with the living/dining area. Features sustainable materials, energy-efficient appliances, and ample storage solutions.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious room with Vastu alignment promoting positive energy flow. Includes built-in storage and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Comfortable room designed for privacy, optimized using sustainable materials and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Smaller yet functional space with adequate storage, following eco-friendly design principles.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace designed for productivity. Features soundproofing and ample natural light to maintain a peaceful environment.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Efficient design with water-saving fixtures, ensuring minimal environmental impact while maintaining functionality.

openings.description: Large windows to maximize natural light and ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles.
Durable and energy-efficient door for secure access in accordance with local building norms.
Separate opening leading to the eco-friendly swimming pool, designed to conserve water and energy.
